interface.name: ValueExp
interface.javadoc: Represents values that can be passed as arguments to relational expressions. Strings, numbers, attributes are valid values and should be represented by implementations of ValueExp. 1.5

Applies the ValueExp on a MBean. name The name of the MBean on which the ValueExp will be applied. The ValueExp. BadStringOperationException BadBinaryOpValueExpException BadAttributeValueExpException InvalidApplicationException

Sets the MBean server on which the query is to be performed. s The MBean server on which the query is to be performed. This method is not needed because a ValueExp can access the MBean server in which it is being evaluated by using {@link QueryEval#getMBeanServer()}.
